scripts.create-database: set PGPASSWORD=sunwitpetchoo&& psql -U postgres -h localhost -d mrcoffee -f sql/createdb.sql

scripts.seed-table: set PGPASSWORD=sunwitpetchoo&& psql -U postgres -h localhost -d mrcoffee -f sql/seed_schedules.sql
scripts.connect-psql: set PGPASSWORD=sunwitpetchoo&& psql -U postgres -h localhost -d mrcoffee
